title: Fonts similar to Scala
content:
Hello,

I'm designing a logo for a co. that is associated with newer commercial jet airplanes and am looking for fonts that communicate technical and mechanical innovation (but not NASA looking).

Suggestions welcome.
author: salisae

comments.content:
If you want a modern looking Sans without being 'techno' looking, how about [FP Dancer](http://web.archive.org/web/20140725141950/http:/www.fontshop.com/fontlist/super_families/fp_dancer/?&sample_text=Whisperjet%20WHISPERJET&update=0), or [Sansa](http://web.archive.org/web/20140725141950/http:/www.fontshop.com/fontlist/super_families/sansa/?&sample_text=Whisperjet%20WHISPERJET&update=0)? Admittedly, this is a random sampling, but I think these look fresh without being the clichéd 'techno' look we see too much of. Maybe some added slanting would be OK too with these.

- Mike Yanega
Thank you, Mike. Sansa is working rather nicely.
